content: your hook as you started with work return row as usual row 3 skipping the first and second vertical bar *yarn over hook twice insert hook into next 2 vertical bars one stitch from each pair from the previous row let the yarn fall forward and down yarn over and pull through both stitches 3 loops on hook repeat from * until 2 vertical bars remain pull the yarn to the front of the hook and over the top of the hook hold the yarn on the hook while working each of the last 2 vertical bars as tunisian simple stitch you should have the same number of loops on your hook as you started with work return row as usual repeat row 2 & 3 until blanket reaches desired length ending on row 3 bind off skipping the first vertical bar *pull the yarn to the front of the work and insert the hook in the next 2 vertical bars let the yarn fall forward and down yarn over and pull through all 3 loops on the hook chain 1 repeat from * across fasten_off attach cc along any side chain 3 insert hook into the back camel hump of the current chain see fig 5 yarn over and pull loop through insert hook into the next camel hump yarn over and pull loop through insert hook into next stitch yarn over and pull loop through 4 loops on hook yarn over and pull through 2 loops 3 times continue bllt all around blanket working 5 bllts into each corner slip_stitch to first bllt finish off weave in all ends figure 1 figure 2 figure 3 figure 4 figure 5
